name: bionicjs
description: Bionic.js let you share the business logic between different native languages without using any framework and without writing a single line of bridging code.
author: Forge S.r.l.

scripts.compile-parser: node node_modules/pegjs/bin/pegjs --allowed-start-rules "TagLine, Tags, BionicTag, DescriptionTag" -o parser/annotation/Parser.js parser/annotation/pegjsSrc/Parser.pegjs

jest-comment: the transform:{} config is to disable transpillation and avoid problems while debugging async code
